title: Ranked Game disappeared
body: Was in a middle of a ranked game as morgana support, as jax and I were about to gank lulu and nami the game disconnects. I exited to reconnect  and now there is no evidence that the game ever happened.

replies.body: Hey thanks for the info here!  I looked into this for you, and it looks like that match resulted in a disappearing game.  The server essentially lost connection to the match and it ended for everyone.  This is super are, and I'm sorry it happened.  :(  On the plus, though, you wouldn't lose any LP or penalties for it.
